scripts.build: npm run prepare && gitbook build -g sergiodxa/redux-in-spanish
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push https://github.com/sergiodxa/redux-in-spanish.git gh-pages --force
